    • getStatDates

      private java.util.List<java.time.LocalDate> getStatDates​(java.time.LocalDate from, java.time.LocalDate to)
      Given two dates, splits them into 10 week intervals.
      Parameters:
      from - query option fromDate (start date) received from the HTML datePicker.
      to - query option toDate (end date) received from the HTML datePicker.
      Returns:
      list of dates.

    • getStats

      private java.util.List<Statistic> getStats​(java.time.LocalDate fromDate, java.time.LocalDate toDate, int projectId, java.lang.String query, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req) throws java.lang.Exception
      Gets a list of statistics filtered by the parameters.
      Parameters:
      fromDate - query option fromDate (start date) received from the HTML datePicker.
      toDate - query option toDate (end date) received from the HTML datePicker.
      projectId - the project's id.
      query - query string, depending on what type of stats to get, received from URL query.
      req - the current httpRequest.
      Returns:
      A list of the requested statistics.
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if statistics could not be received.

    • actionIsAllowed

      private boolean actionIsAllowed​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req, int projectId)
      Checks if the current user is allowed to perform the action.
      Parameters:
      req - the current httpRequest.
      projectId - the project's id.
      Returns:
      whether this action is allowed or not.

    • getRoleIdFor

      private int getRoleIdFor​(java.lang.String name, java.util.List<Role> roles)
      Gets the roleId given the roles name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the role to get id for.
      roles - all available roles.
      Returns:
      the role's Id or 0.

    • getIdForUser

      private int getIdForUser​(java.lang.String username)
      Gets the userId given the username.
      Parameters:
      username - the username to get userId for.
      Returns:
      the userId linked to the username or -1 if not found.

    • statsToGet

      private StatisticController.StatisticType statsToGet​(java.lang.String query, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)
      Gets a StatisticType given parameter options.
      Parameters:
      query - query string, depending on what type of stats to get, received from URL query.
      req - the current httpRequest.
      Returns:
      a StatisticType.

    • statisticsPageForm

      private java.lang.String statisticsPageForm​(java.util.List<Statistic> statistics, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req, java.time.LocalDate from, java.time.LocalDate to)
      Gets the HTML to display on this page.
      Parameters:
      statistics - list of statistics.
      req - the current httpRequest.
      from - the date to check from. Will use first day of week if null provided.
      to - the date to check to. Will use last day of week if null provided.
      Returns:
      the HTML for the site.

    • getSelectOptions

      private java.lang.String getSelectOptions​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)
      Gets the options in HTML format for the different statistic groups.
      Parameters:
      req - the current httpRequest.
      Returns:
      the HTML code for select options.

    • getStatisticsDataTable

      private java.lang.String getStatisticsDataTable​(Statistic statistic)
      Makes HTML of statistics data.
      Parameters:
      statistic - The statistic to get in HTML format.
      Returns:
      HTML for the statistics in table format.
